actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To extend reemployment services and eligibility assessments to all claimants for unemployment benefits, and for other purposes.
short_title: Building on Reemployment Improvements to Deliver Good Employment (BRIDGE) for Workers Act
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text:
Building on Reemployment Improvements to Deliver Good Employment (BRIDGE) for Workers Act

This bill allows states to use funding for reemployment services and eligibility assessments to serve all workers receiving unemployment benefits—not just those most likely to exhaust their benefits. The bill also allows states to provide reemployment services to individuals receiving pandemic unemployment assistance and pandemic emergency unemployment compensation.
